prod_short_desc: Help Anna and Kristoff bring summer back to Arendelle!
prod_long_desc:
Enter the world of Disney Frozen on an exciting sleigh ride with Anna and Kristoff. Whether you're traveling through the snow or shopping for winter supplies at Wandering Oaken's Trading Post, Kristoff's sleigh allows you to reenact memorable scenes from the film and create new stories of your own. Includes Anna and Kristoff mini-doll figures plus Sven the reindeer.
LEGO Disney Frozen building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Sleigh measures over 2” high, 6” long and 2” wide. Wandering Oaken's Trading Post measures over 3” high, 3” wide and 1” long. Barn fascia measures over 2” high, 3” wide and 1” long.
174 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
